title: BROKE vs PRO iPhone!
description: Check out CASETiFY cases!  Ken's @Denki video on AirPods Pro 2:  The latest @thisis video:    Today on BROKE vs PRO Ken and Austin go head to head to see: do you need the iPhone 14 Pro or is the iPhone SE 3 enough? What about AirPods vs AirPods Max?  Subscribe for more!  TikTok:  Instagram:  Twitter:   Chapter Titles: 0:00 Is a cheap iPhone better? 0:39 iPhone 14 Pro vs SE Camera 4:11 AirPods vs AirPods Max 6:29 Which is better for gaming? 9:34 Who made the better video?
